question: 否定形
sourceMnemonic: <ja>否定</ja> is denial. Remember how <ja>形</ja> sometimes refers to grammar tense / type? Well, with a denial type grammar, you have a <vocabulary>negative form</vocabulary>, making it a <vocabulary>negative sentence</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
